About me

tl;dr

I am a software developer with 10+ years of experience in end-to-end application design and development. I’m always looking for challenging projects where I can apply my extensive knowledge of technologies and methodologies. My mother tongue is Portuguese, but I am fluent in written English and proficient in spoken English as well.

I know what I'm doing and I can deliver value even on challenging projects. I'm dying to do so. Let's talk! I can speak Portuguese and English.

My primary focus and experience is with WEB development, especially backend systems. In addition, I have a great interest and competency in the development of rich user interfaces using the latest browser and javascript-related technologies, as well as webscale database and server configuration / optimization.

I love to work in the backend, but it doesn't mean I can't work on the frontend as well. Plus, I'm what they call a devops.
